dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, is this Fintiv company, uh, you know, a legitimate tech giant, or just a front for something much, much darker?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fintiv's chairman, Adolfo Salume, stated their policy is to "eliminate our competition" and "ensure our dominance." He said their first inclination is cyber warfare, but a lawsuit is just a "product of our inability to use our cyber weapons."
